duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform delegated functions as a member of a patient care team to provide a variety of services in accordance with all existing regulatory and hospital standards, policies, and procedures.
Contribute to meeting the health care, safety, and comfort needs of patients under the supervision of a Registered Nurse.
Report to Unit Manager and ensure compliance with prescribed protocols and care plans.
Assist in the care of specialty patient populations including heart transplant patients, Ventricular Assist Device patients, and the growing TAVR population.
Provide care to a variety of medical and surgical patients requiring higher levels of care and training in a step-down unit.
Measure and report on patient care performance and contribute to continuous improvement in patient care strategies.
